name: Idunno Goes Camping
description:
Help Idunno get back to their car by building up campfires with the logs scattered around. Move from campfire to campfire as dangerous Splooshes attempt to put them out! Walk into the Splooshes to dispel them. 

Controls:

WASD for movement.

Esc to go back to the main menu.

Developed by: David Majercak, Griffin Annis, John Iles, & Zachary Kaster for the Spring 2023 Game Jam
